items.ja: 'Years in the making' - are Arsenal ready to shed 'nearly-men' tag?
items.en: 'Years in the making' - are Arsenal ready to shed 'nearly-men' tag?
items.text_for_match: 'Years in the making' - are Arsenal ready to shed 'nearly-men' tag? Arsenal have moved a step closer to winning their first major silverware since 2020 by beating Chelsea 4-2 on aggregate in the Carabao Cup semi-final. Arsenal have moved a step closer to winning their first major silverware since 2020 by beating Chelsea 4-2 on aggregate in the Carabao Cup semi-final.

items.ja: Chelsea adopt Match of the Day tactic to stop Arsenal set-piece threat
items.en: Chelsea adopt Match of the Day tactic to stop Arsenal set-piece threat
items.text_for_match: Chelsea adopt Match of the Day tactic to stop Arsenal set-piece threat Despite losing their Carabao Cup semi-final, Chelsea attempted a new way of stopping Arsenal set-pieces - just days after a similar suggestion on Match of the Day. Despite losing their Carabao Cup semi-final, Chelsea attempted a new way of stopping Arsenal set-pieces - just days after a similar suggestion on Match of the Day.
